akas: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (original title)
Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 USA
akas from release info: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (original title)
Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 USA

1.title: Part 1

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

1.plot: Jake, boards a flight to Phoenix without his mom, who hasn't made the flight and has a worrying phone call from her as the plane begins to move.

2.title: Part 2

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

2.plot: The plane begins to take off while Jake attempts to text his mother to find out what's happening. One of the passengers next to Jake, Marcus, becomes ill.

3.title: Part 3

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

3.plot: Jake talks to Connie sharing how he took the flight without his mother. Meanwhile, the flight attendants begin serving drinks to the passengers.

4.title: Flight 462: Part 4

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

4.plot: Marcus continues to get sick and finally heads to the bathroom and locks himself in the cabin stall. Charlie asks his wife how long he's been sick.

5.title: Flight 462: Part 5

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

5.plot: The stewardess announces the plane is in its final descent to Phoenix. Marcus remains locked in the bathroom while Deirdre and Suzanne plead with him to open the bathroom door.

6.title: Flight 462: Part 6

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

6.plot: The city below starts to blackout as Deirdre attempts to get Marcus to unlock the bathroom door. When he finally does he collapses on the cabin floor.

7.title: Flight 462: Part 7

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

7.plot: The captain announces that the plane has been re-routed from Phoenix to LA due to the power outage. Anthony attempts CPR on the collapsed Marcus and as he is further examined it is discovered he has a wound on his abdomen.

8.title: Flight 462: Part 8

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

8.plot: Noticing Marcus's wound, Charlie tells the others that they should tie Marcus up. Anthony reveals himself as the Flight Marshall and orders everyone back into their seats. Suddenly, Marcus opens his eyes revealing he has turned.

9.title: Flight 462: Part 9

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

9.plot: Marcus has turned into a walker and after a struggle the group shoves him back into the bathroom. Once he is secured they notice blood on themselves and determine that Deirdre was scratched on the arm.

10.title: Flight 462: Part 10

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

10.plot: Charlie tells Anthony to secure Deirdre since she has been bit and will turn like Marcus. Charlie tries to convince the Captain to land the plane, but all the cities are experiencing power loss.

11.title: Flight 462: Part 11

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

11.plot: Suzanne mourns the loss of her husband from outside the compartment door where he is held while he continues to bang on the door from the other side. Anthony tends to Deirdre's bite wound.

12.title: Flight 462: Part 12

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

12.plot: When Suzanne's husband stops banging on the door, she fears that it is a sign he is dying. She then unlocks the cabin bathroom door releasing him into the isle where all chaos breaks loose.

13.title: Flight 462: Part 13

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

13.plot: With Marcus on the loose, Jake finds a knitting needle and hands it to Charlie who takes care of the situation. Once it's done, the group notices a crack has formed in one of the plane's windows and it's starting to spread.

14.title: Flight 462: Part 14

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

14.plot: Suzanne who has been bitten is comforted by Deirdre while Charlie takes matters into her own hands concerning how to deal with the bite wound. The window which has been slowly cracking finally completely shatters.

15.title: Flight 462: Part 15

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

15.plot: As the airplane cabin depressurizes, the passengers struggle to find available seats and strap on oxygen masks. Charlie and Jake buckle in next to each other and she makes a startling revelation to him.

16.title: Flight 462: Part 16

episode of.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 (TV Mini-Series 2015–2016)

16.plot: As Nick is scoping out houses to break into, he looks up to see Flight 462 teetering back and forth as it approaches LAX.

imdb.plot outline: Series based in the same universe as The Walking Dead (2010), and Fear The Walking Dead (2015). A webseries in one-minute episodes. In Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462 you will follow passengers on flight 462, and how they will handle the situation when one of the passengers seems to be infected.
imdb.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462
plot: A group of passengers on a plane deal with the beginning stages of the apocalypse.

Series based in the same universe as The Walking Dead (2010), and Fear The Walking Dead (2015). A webseries in one-minute episodes. In _Fear the Walking Dead: Flight 462_ (qv) you will follow passengers on flight 462, and how they will handle the situation when one of the passengers seems to be infected.::Cornelius Guillaume
synopsis: Fear The Walking Dead: Flight 462 tells the story of a group of passengers aboard a commercial airplane during the earliest moments of the outbreak. Over the course of the series, the plane and the lives of its passengers are put in jeopardy once they discover an infected traveler.
